author: ben_a_adams
content: Added suggestion to adopt QUIC for Libp2p (which it supports) as regardless of link speed (even if 1GBps) if you are connected to a peer on otherside of world with 225ms RTT and 0.1% packet loss your max speed over TCP on ipv4 will be 200kbps

author: tersec
content: There seemed to be some agreement on QUIC as of 3 weeks ago: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3866

author: ben_a_adams
content: Added ref; TCP is terrible especially since the p2p intentionally doesn't choose peers by fastest ping times (as that would be an unresilient network)
